title: Unfair ban
body:
I was banned because in post game chat i talked about a person who trolled and decided to feed. I dropped the n word but he was not even there and everyone there told me it was justified... Is the vlad and fizz who both afked and int'ed intentionally in my ranked game banned?

ALSO the vlad followed me in jungle stealing all my camps.... do you even have anything set up in the game to stop int's???

I admit i have been a little toxic the past few weeks... I lost my job and life has not been going great for me... BUT I really dont deserve a ban because of trolls... This leads back to dunkey... Why am i being punished because there is a troll and i tell them to "piss off" in my own more toxic way?

replies.body: If the vlad was following you around in the jungle and stealing all your camps... how do they only have 2 neutral minions killed in the stats?

I looked at the replay, it does look like he was trolling that game. But seriously, just report trolls. Blowing up in chat, be it pre/in/post game, is not going to convince them to change their ways. Just report them.
Bro he was not even there everyone called him a troll and yet IM the one who gets banned?
you called him the N word. is this surprising to you? like actually? do you say that word in public?

No need, replays are public.

So what he was trolling? That doesn't give you the right to flame him - whether he's present or not.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Hybiek99,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-17T04:10:14.404+0000)
>
> No need, replays are public.
> 
> So what he was trolling? That doesn't give you the right to flame him - whether he's present or not.

If you at post game chat everyone there was telling me that i was justified in my actions... All i want is either a reduction or i will take a chat ban.... I did not even say anything to him IN GAME

You used hate speech, it does not matter the context, the fact you considered that appropriate is not acceptable in the slightest. You should not need a warning that hate speech is unacceptable, **especially** when used to describe/towards another player.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Hybiek99,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-06-17T04:43:25.007+0000)
>
> You used hate speech, it does not matter the context, the fact you considered that appropriate is not acceptable in the slightest. You should not need a warning that hate speech is unacceptable, **especially** when used to describe/towards another player.

So you would rather have a game full of people pissing people off RATHER then people getting pissed off??? Thats how toxic people come to be in the first place... so by not punishing the people at the Root of the problem your just causing more people to become toxic

Huh? No, I'd rather anyone pissing others off deliberately and/or being toxic get punished.

Again, it's not an "either or". You can both be wrong, and it's highly likely both of you end up punished. Your behavior was unacceptable. His behavior was unacceptable. Neither of your behavior was acceptable.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Hybiek99,comment-id=0000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-17T04:46:33.921+0000)
>
> Huh? No, I'd rather anyone pissing others off deliberately and/or being toxic get punished.
> 
> Again, it's not an "either or". You can both be wrong, and it's highly likely both of you end up punished. Your behavior was unacceptable. His behavior was unacceptable. Neither of your behavior was acceptable.

So let me ask you this... if i may because this is a rare opportunity to help myself grow as a "summoner" If i am in a lobby and there is NO ONE in the post game lobby but me and i say something that breaks code... Will i get banned? because i mean, no one is there to get offended and its just me blowing off steam?

If someone reported you for in game offenses, and your post game chat was poor, then yes, it may factor in. You cannot rely on "A summoner has left the lobby" - to be honest it's not very accurate sometimes.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Hybiek99,comment-id=000000000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-17T04:51:30.758+0000)
>
> If someone reported you for in game offenses, and your post game chat was poor, then yes, it may factor in. You cannot rely on "A summoner has left the lobby" - to be honest it's not very accurate sometimes.

well if i need to blow off some steam and everyone in post game is telling its ok... "i even asked... if you look at chat logs"  and none of them are getting offended and im caught by the AUTO ban system (thats what happened by the way) is it really my fault? you have to admit that this game is not the most fun some times... but i have an addiction and i cant stop...

By the way i appreciate that you are taking the time to talk to me about this... I am actually learning some stuff...

No, don't post the video.

Shaming others is not permissible on the boards, and it will result in removal of your post.

His behavior is not what got you punished here though, yours is.
What gives him the right to int in my ranked game?
thats not the point. What gives you the right to be racist and flame someone? cause they were mean to you? common maaaaaaaaaaan

> [{quoted}](name=TheSnowyLeopard,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Hybiek99,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-17T04:39:39.416+0000)
>
> thats not the point. What gives you the right to be racist and flame someone? cause they were mean to you? common maaaaaaaaaaan

He was not even in  the chat said nothing to him while he was in game or post chat...
so calling someone names behind their backs is ok? but not to their face?

You're being punished for your own attitude.
You are responsible for your own actions. What you chose to do is on you.
Just because someone pushes your buttons, annoys you, insults you, or harasses you doesn't mean you get to do it back. No one here gets special privileges. 

This case is about you and you only. If your Vlad had a case for his penalty, then that'd be about him.
If the Vlad you mentioned got a penalty and comes here with the same complaint, we'd say exactly the same thing to him as we've said to you.
